sect2.title: Installation of Sh-utils
sect2.para: Install Sh-utils by running the following commands:
During the make install stage you will see the following warning:

blockquote.screen: WARNING: insufficient access; not installing su NOTE: to install su, run 'make install-root' as root

sect2.para: You can safely ignore that warning. You need to be logged in as root in order to install su the way Sh-utils wants to install it, which is being suid root. Because we don't need su during chapter 6, and su will be properly installed when we re-install Sh-utils in chapter 6, you can just pretend you didn't see it.
